definition: to reply officially to a subordinate
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: The State Council has officially approved the Qianhai Bay Bonded Port Area in Shenzhen recently.
sentences.chinese: 国务院正式批复同意设立深圳前海湾保税港区。

sentences.english: The final construction scale is subject to the ratified reply of Development and Reform Bureau of Baoan District.
sentences.chinese: 最终建设规模以宝安区发展和改革局立项批复为准。

sentences.english: After I saw a report in the newspaper last year, I started paying attention to the approval of the Xiao Nanhai hydroelectric power station.
sentences.chinese: 去年看了报纸的报道后，关注小南海水电站的批复。

sentences.english: A fatuous and self-indulgent ruler wouldn't spend much time reading and replying to memorials.
sentences.chinese: 一个昏君是不会用多少时间来批复奏疏的。

sentences.english: Coastal Tourism Master Plan has received a formal city approval.
sentences.chinese: 滨海旅游区总体规划日前获得市政府正式批复。

sentences.english: Audit all samples of merchandiser dept and give comment.
sentences.chinese: 审核跟单部所有批复的样衣，并提出有效建议。

sentences.english: After-tax profits for 2008 are distributed pursuant to the written reply of the Ministry of Finance.
sentences.chinese: 根据财政部批复，对2008年税后利润进行分配。

sentences.english: Stanford University shall remit the principal within 6 months since the date of the issuance of this Reply.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大学应在本批复之日起6个月内汇入本金。

sentences.english: Prepared and issued "notification of withdrawal application" to student.
sentences.chinese: 已准备并已把《学生退学申请批复信》发给学生。

definition: to authorize/to investigate then ratify
to approve/to ratify
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to examine and approve/to endorse
official written ruling in response to a submission/official approval in writing
State Council (PRC)/State Department (USA)
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
to write comments on a report submitted by a subordinate/written comments from a superior
to launch a project
to prepare to build sth
to approve and forward/to endorse/stamp "approved for distribution"
deliberation/pondering/due consideration
to draw up/to draft/to formulate
